/>
Introduction
This topic contains information on deemed valid marriage cases in which there are multiple claimants and the legal surviving spouse’s income exceeds the limits for pension, including
how a legal surviving spouse’s non-entitlement impacts multiple-claimant cases
actions to take when a legal surviving spouse’s income exceeds pension limits
, and
example of a claim in which the legal surviving spouse’s income exceeds pension limits
.
title: M21-1, Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section D - Establishing Marital Relationship in Survivors Cases
citation: Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section D
